analysis.description:
Crowdsale.calculateExcessTokens (/unique_chucks/16/0x939da7bce862f79676db57267ebd6856eaead7c1.sol#777-798) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- msg.sender.transfer(weiNextTier) (/unique_chucks/16/0x939da7bce862f79676db57267ebd6856eaead7c1.sol#798)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.checkCompletedCrowdsale (/unique_chucks/16/0x939da7bce862f79676db57267ebd6856eaead7c1.sol#744-759):
	External calls:
	- vault.enableRefunds() (/unique_chucks/16/0x939da7bce862f79676db57267ebd6856eaead7c1.sol#748)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- isEnded (/unique_chucks/16/0x939da7bce862f79676db57267ebd6856eaead7c1.sol#751)

PallyCoin.totalSupply (/unique_chucks/16/0x939da7bce862f79676db57267ebd6856eaead7c1.sol#330-331) shadows:
	- ERC20Basic.totalSupply (/unique_chucks/16/0x939da7bce862f79676db57267ebd6856eaead7c1.sol#128)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/16/0x939da7bce862f79676db57267ebd6856eaead7c1.sol#581-639):
	External calls:
	- token.distributeICOTokens(msg.sender,tokens) (/unique_chucks/16/0x939da7bce862f79676db57267ebd6856eaead7c1.sol#623)
	External calls sending eth:
	- amountPaid = calculateExcessBalance() (/unique_chucks/16/0x939da7bce862f79676db57267ebd6856eaead7c1.sol#584-585)
	- tokens = calculateExcessTokens(amountPaid,limitTier1,1,rate) (/unique_chucks/16/0x939da7bce862f79676db57267ebd6856eaead7c1.sol#592-593)
	- tokens = calculateExcessTokens(amountPaid,limitTier2,2,rateTier2) (/unique_chucks/16/0x939da7bce862f79676db57267ebd6856eaead7c1.sol#601-603)
	- tokens = calculateExcessTokens(amountPaid,limitTier3,3,rateTier3) (/unique_chucks/16/0x939da7bce862f79676db57267ebd6856eaead7c1.sol#608-609)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- numberOfTransactions (/unique_chucks/16/0x939da7bce862f79676db57267ebd6856eaead7c1.sol#629-630)
	- tokensBought (/unique_chucks/16/0x939da7bce862f79676db57267ebd6856eaead7c1.sol#628)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/16/0x939da7bce862f79676db57267ebd6856eaead7c1.sol#581-639):
	External calls:
	- token.distributeICOTokens(msg.sender,tokens) (/unique_chucks/16/0x939da7bce862f79676db57267ebd6856eaead7c1.sol#623)
	- vault.deposit.value(amountPaid)(msg.sender) (/unique_chucks/16/0x939da7bce862f79676db57267ebd6856eaead7c1.sol#632-633)
	- vault.close() (/unique_chucks/16/0x939da7bce862f79676db57267ebd6856eaead7c1.sol#633-634)
	- checkCompletedCrowdsale() (/unique_chucks/16/0x939da7bce862f79676db57267ebd6856eaead7c1.sol#639)
	External calls sending eth:
	- amountPaid = calculateExcessBalance() (/unique_chucks/16/0x939da7bce862f79676db57267ebd6856eaead7c1.sol#584-585)
	- tokens = calculateExcessTokens(amountPaid,limitTier1,1,rate) (/unique_chucks/16/0x939da7bce862f79676db57267ebd6856eaead7c1.sol#592-593)
	- tokens = calculateExcessTokens(amountPaid,limitTier2,2,rateTier2) (/unique_chucks/16/0x939da7bce862f79676db57267ebd6856eaead7c1.sol#601-603)
	- tokens = calculateExcessTokens(amountPaid,limitTier3,3,rateTier3) (/unique_chucks/16/0x939da7bce862f79676db57267ebd6856eaead7c1.sol#608-609)
	- walletB.transfer(amountPaid) (/unique_chucks/16/0x939da7bce862f79676db57267ebd6856eaead7c1.sol#631)
	- vault.deposit.value(amountPaid)(msg.sender) (/unique_chucks/16/0x939da7bce862f79676db57267ebd6856eaead7c1.sol#632-633)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- isRefunding (/unique_chucks/16/0x939da7bce862f79676db57267ebd6856eaead7c1.sol#639)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.checkCompletedCrowdsale (/unique_chucks/16/0x939da7bce862f79676db57267ebd6856eaead7c1.sol#744-759):
	External calls:
	- vault.enableRefunds() (/unique_chucks/16/0x939da7bce862f79676db57267ebd6856eaead7c1.sol#748)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- isRefunding (/unique_chucks/16/0x939da7bce862f79676db57267ebd6856eaead7c1.sol#749-751)
